org.baswell.sessioncookie

Interface SessionCookieErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SessionCookieDefaultErrorHandler

    public interface SessionCookieErrorHandler
    Interface for handling all errors and warnings from the SessionCookie library.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClassNotFoundFromSessionException(ClassNotFoundException exception)
      Called when a ClassNotFoundException trying to deserialize a session from a cookie value.
      void onCookieDecodeError(SessionCookieDecodingException exception)
      Called when a received session cookie was decrypted but could not be decoded.
      void onCookieDecryptError(SessionCookieDecryptionException exception)
      Called when a received session cookie could not be decrypted.
      void onGeneralSecurityException(GeneralSecurityException exception, SessionCookieParameters parameters, boolean encrypting)
      Called when the Cipher could not be initialized for the given SessionCookieParameters.getSymmetricEncryptionAlgorithm() and SessionCookieParameters.getSymmetricEncryptionKey().
      void onSessionCookieSizeWarning(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session, int cookieSizeBytes)
      Called when a session cookie value is equal to or greater than SessionCookieParameters.getCookieSizeWarning().

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionCookieSizeWarning

        void onSessionCookieSizeWarning(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                int cookieSizeBytes)
        Called when a session cookie value is equal to or greater than SessionCookieParameters.getCookieSizeWarning(). Most browsers only support a cookie size less then 4KB so it's important to keep session cookies below this value.
        Parameters:
        session - The HTTP session
        cookieSizeBytes - The size in bytes of the session cookie

      • onCookieDecodeError

        void onCookieDecodeError(SessionCookieDecodingException exception)
        Called when a received session cookie was decrypted but could not be decoded.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception thrown attempting to decode a cookie value.

      • onCookieDecryptError

        void onCookieDecryptError(SessionCookieDecryptionException exception)
        Called when a received session cookie could not be decrypted.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception thrown attempting to decrypt a cookie value.

      • onGeneralSecurityException

        void onGeneralSecurityException(GeneralSecurityException exception,
                                SessionCookieParameters parameters,
                                boolean encrypting)
        Called when the Cipher could not be initialized for the given SessionCookieParameters.getSymmetricEncryptionAlgorithm() and SessionCookieParameters.getSymmetricEncryptionKey().
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception thrown while initializing the Cipher
        parameters - The session parameters used to initialize the Cipher
        encrypting - true if this error occurred while trying to encrypt false if the error occurred while trying to decrypt.

      • onClassNotFoundFromSessionException

        void onClassNotFoundFromSessionException(ClassNotFoundException exception)
        Called when a ClassNotFoundException trying to deserialize a session from a cookie value.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception thrown while trying to deserialize the session
